data.comment: The big names in today's match at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, Dae Yong Kim, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 2, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
Ulsan Hyundai's Koh Myeong-jin misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Ball safe as Seoul is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Dae Yong Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Seoul are coming forward and Ko Kwang-min gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 10, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Ulsan Hyundai's Junior Negrao is on target but unsuccessful.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 12, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai drives forward and Junior Negrao gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 18, Chung-Yong Lee scores to make it 1-0 at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 25, Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Seoul's Jo Yeong-uk breaks free at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
In the minute 32, Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 35, In Ulsan Ulsan Hyundai attack through Junior Negrao. The finish is off target, however.
Dae Yong Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
In the minute 41, Ulsan Hyundai take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Junior Negrao.
Great play from Chung-Yong Lee to set up the goal.
Seoul make their first substitution with Cha Oh-yeon replacing Hwang Hyun-soo.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Ulsan.
Ulsan Hyundai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Seoul.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has just kicked-off.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 49, Dae Yong Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai attack but Chung-Yong Lee's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 50, It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Yoon Bit-garam is replacing Park Jeong-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Kim Do-Hoon is making the team's second substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Lee Dong-kyeong replacing Koh Myeong-jin.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Dae Yong Kim.
Throw-in high up the field for Ulsan Hyundai in Ulsan.
In the minute 59, Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Yo-Han Go is replacing Jo Yeong-uk for the away team.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 66, Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a third substitution, with Sung-Yueng Ki replacing Jung Hyun-cheol.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 68, At Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium, Cha Oh-yeon has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Dae Yong Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai's half.
Kim Tae-hwan (Ulsan Hyundai) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Seoul's Yun Ju-tae gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 81, Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Ulsan Hyundai goal kick.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In the minute 86, Free kick Seoul.
Dae Yong Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
In the minute 89, Seoul have a dangerous throw-in.
Jeong Hoon-sung is on a sub for Chung-Yong Lee for Ulsan Hyundai.
Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Seoul.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Dae Yong Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
The match is over. Final score 3-0.
Goal! Ulsan Hyundai extend their lead to 3-0 through Jeong Hoon-sung.
